Class SetTimeSpeedPatch

Creates a flag when TaleWorlds.CampaignSystem.Campaign.SetTimeSpeed(System.Int32) is called.

More about it on issue #113 and check issue #108 for more information.

System.Object
SetTimeSpeedPatch

Namespace: Coop.Mod.Patch.CampaignPatches
Assembly: Coop.dll
Syntax
[HarmonyPatch(typeof(Campaign), "SetTimeSpeed")]
static class SetTimeSpeedPatch
Remarks
This class prefixes TaleWorlds.CampaignSystem.Campaign.SetTimeSpeed(System.Int32) to add a flag and know when the user have changed the map speed.
